Beauty shot makes the facial skin to appear brighter and smoother.
Continuous shot takes six photos immediately one after another. Managing photos are available when auto review is on.
HDR combines photos taken at different exposures to one optimal photo while compensating for backlight by enhancing multiple exposure control.
Live effect provides various visual effects when recording a video. Choose an effect, and begin recording.
"Continuous photos are assembled into one single panoramic image. Press shutter to start and slowly turn the camera across from one end to the other. "
